name: Paul Craig
description:
This is Paul Craig. He is mixed martial arts fighter from... oh, just take a guess.

Scotland. Paul Craig is from Scotland. Duh. And, no, he is not Jewish... but why does someone who looks like THAT have such a high O Score?

It has to do with his nickname: Paul "Bearjew" Craig. What gives?

We see two options here: either Paul picked the nickname as homage to Eli Roth's character, the baseball-bat-wielding soldier from Quentin Tarantino's "Inglorious Basterds", who was nicknamed "Bear Jew"... or because he resembles a giant Jewish bear.

Frankly, we just don't see it.

function flip() { setTitleOnly('Paul "Bearjew" Craig'); }
function loadPic() { showDiv(null, 'bear'); }
